#!/bin/bash
# Download and extract the BrowserQuest v1.2 tarball curl -sL https://github.com/browserquest/BrowserQuest/tarball/v1.2 | tar xzp
# Add the Node.js modules required for BrowserQuest cd browserquest-BrowserQuest-629882b npm install -d
# Set up BrowerQuest startup script chmod 755 /etc/init.d/browserquest chkconfig --add browserquest chkconfig browserquest on
